lecture.speech: Next, I'll teach you how to erase the notes.
I think I can use this button which has eraser picture.
You are clever. When you push the eraser button, you can change the mode from Pencil mode to Eraser mode.
And then, I can erase the notes when I click them.
That's right! Moreover, you can erase the notes while you push the left button and touch the notes.
I see! It's fun to erase the notes!
Don't be in a trance. Otherwise you will erase all of the notes!
OK, I can't make music without writing notes!
Let's make music using Eraser Mode well!
